title: Citibank Letterhead
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description: CITIBANK in dark gray embossed sans serif letters followed by Citibank logo [oval with four pointed star] at upper right corner. Below, a thin red line runs across sheet left to right.  Below line, in dark gray at upper left: Citibank, N.A. / 399 Park Avenue / New York, N.Y. / 10022.  Also in dark gray, but in a thicker font to the right of the address: Tarrant Putnam / Vice President
name: Print
